page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Mindless idiots have been blamed for a crash on the A27 at Poling which fatally injured a horse and wrote off a car. Vandals broke down a fence letting three horses escape and stray onto the dual carriageway. The car driver escaped unhurt. The two loose horses ran back to their stable unharmed. It was not the first time the fence had been torn down and the horses let free. A couple of years ago exactly the samething happened. Vandalism is a feature of the 1980's even in this rural area. Pets have been killed,school windows smashed and a pond which children had built was destroyed. Nobody seems to know the solution to this problem.
